name: VBScript Payload Stored in Registry
description: Detects VBScript content stored into registry keys as seen being used by UNC2452 group
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*[Vv][Bb][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Jj][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Uu][Nn][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee]\(.*/ OR /.*[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Gg][Rr][Ee][Aa][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Cc][Ll][Oo][Ss][Ee].*/)) AND (NOT ((registry.path:/.*[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr]\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Mm][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Oo][Pp]\ [Aa][Ss][Ss][Ee][Mm][Bb][Ll][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\<\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll],[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\=.*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ll]_[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]_[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]_[Dd][Ll][Ll]_____[Xx]86\..*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]_[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]_[Dd][Ll][Ll]_1_____[Xx]86\..*/ OR /.*\<\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll],[Cc][Uu][Ll][Tt][Uu][Rr][Ee]\=.*/)))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion* AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*vbscript* OR *jscript* OR *mshtml* OR *RunHTMLApplication* OR *Execute\(* OR *CreateObject* OR *RegRead* OR *window.close*)) AND (NOT ((registry.path:*Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run*) OR (process.executable:*\\msiexec.exe AND registry.path:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Installer\\UserData\\* AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*\\Microsoft.NET\\Primary\ Interop\ Assemblies\\Microsoft.mshtml.dll* OR *<\\Microsoft.mshtml,fileVersion\=* OR *FL_Microsoft_mshtml_dll_____X86.* OR *Microsoft_mshtml_dll_1_____X86.* OR *<\\Microsoft.mshtml,culture\=*)))))`
